help_git_base_url: Remote git base space, e.g. https://github.com/deephdc or https://git.scc.kit.edu/deep . Enter to continue...
description: A short description of the project.
dockerhub_user: User account at hub.docker.com, e.g. 'deephdc' in https://hub.docker.com/u/deephdc
docker_baseimage: Base Docker image for Dockerfile, e.g. tensorflow/tensorflow
baseimage_cpu_tag: CPU tag for the Base Docker image, e.g. 1.12.0-py3. Has to match python version!
baseimage_gpu_tag: GPU tag for the Base Docker image, e.g. 1.12.0-gpu-py3. Has to match python version!
